description: On an as and when requested basis, through the issuance of Task Authorizations (TA), the Contractor must provide an AV System Designer(s) to design, configure, develop, test, and deliver AV solutions based on in a Microsoft environment (MS Teams Rooms, Surface Hubs, etc.), using an agile/incremental approach.
full_summary:
================ **Government Tender Announcement** -------------------------------- ### **Title**: AV Design Services for NPP (Telecommunication Services) #### **Reference Number**: cb-970-83819407 #### **Solicitation Number**: 5000076087 #### **Publication Date**: October 27, 2023 #### **Closing Date**: November 27, 2023, 2:00 PM ET #### **Contracting Entity**: Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission The Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission invites proposals from eligible contractors for the provision of AV (Audiovisual) System Design Services. **Tender Overview** ------------------- The Contractor is required to design, configure, develop, test, and deliver AV solutions based on a Microsoft environment (MS Teams Rooms, Surface Hubs, etc.). The solutions will be developed using an agile/incremental approach, with input and recommendations for the corresponding global AV support model. **Scope of Work** ---------------- The Contractor will provide the following services: * Design, configure, develop, test, and deliver AV solutions * Provide input and recommendations for the global AV support model **Selection Criteria** ------------------- The selection of the successful contractor will be based on a combined rating of Technical Merit and Price. **Trade Agreements** ------------------ This tender is subject to the following trade agreements: * Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) * Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement * Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) **Contracting Information** ------------------------- For tender inquiries and submissions, please contact: * **Janie Latouche** * **Email:** * **Phone:** (000) 000-0000 **Tender Attachments** ---------------------- The tender attachments are available for download from the Government of Canada's Buy and Sell website. ```markdown **Please submit your proposal electronically to:** [solicitation-demandedesoumission@cnsc-ccsn.gc.ca](mailto:solicitation-demandedesoumission@cnsc-ccsn.gc.ca) ``` **Attachments:**
  • NPP - AV Design (TBIPS S7 T.6) L2 & L3 Resources - Amendment 1 (MS Word)
  • NPP - AV Design (TBIPS S7 T.6) L2 & L3 Resources (MS Word)
  • NPP - AV Design (TBIPS S7 T.6
